name: cleqf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

-| diffss(s0, hs0)

-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))

-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)

-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))

-| wnfc(s0, c0)

comment: Establish equality between classes, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. See also ~ cleqh . (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Nov-2019.) Avoid ~ ax-13 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 10-May-2023.)
